about_the_game:
DOES VIOLENCE BREED VIOLENCE?

In an unnamed coastal city, real chaos reigns due to the economic crisis. Banditry and corruption are thriving. Even those who want to live quietly have a hard time.

The main character unwillingly finds himself drawn into the abyss of urban clashes. Everyone you meet can be dangerous and violent, and it becomes extremely difficult to trust anyone. Will he survive this day? What will happen tomorrow? Will he be able to sleep peacefully?

REVENGE IS A DISH THAT TASTES BEST WHEN SERVED COLD

In our game, we wanted to raise the issue of moral values, justice, and choice in general. Ask yourself:

TO KILL OR TO BE KILLED?
TO REJECT OR TO BE REJECTED?
TO DECEIVE OR TO BE DECEIVED?

You don't have to answer now. We'll wait.

TIME FOR ULTRAVIOLENCE

In Insomnia, you are provided with an arsenal of weapons to destroy all your enemies. Colorful levels, diverse locations, lots of opponents and sea of their blood are waiting for you. Here are a couple of interesting features:

One life - the main character does not have a health bar and endless first-aid kits in his pockets. You probably won't survive an AK-47 shot.

Melee fight - out of ammo? Do not forget hand-to-hand combat!

Strategy - the opponents can hear the shots perfectly, so make sure to change your position in advance.

Creativity - if you mix equal parts of gasoline and frozen orange juice concentrate... anyway, do you know that opponents can hit their own guys? Lure them into a narrow space and watch the charm of friendly fire.

STILL WATERS RUN DEEP

Maybe you like to work quietly? We also provide this opportunity. Use the environment, hide from enemy patrols and memorize timings. Any improvised means and terrain can both play into your hands and ruin the whole operation.

Do not raise the alarm - if opponents know about your presence, they will react faster.

Avoid clusters of enemies - the more of them, the harder it will be to hide.

Advance quietly - any noise attracts unnecessary attention.

AND WHO'S TO JUDGE?

The plot sometimes depends on your choice. And although not all events can be prevented, the fate of the characters largely depends on you. Good luck.

short_description: Insomnia is a top-down shooter with psychological horror elements. Take part in fierce firefights, perform tasks covertly, act on intuition. Will you be able to survive all the enemies, stop moral outrage around you, and save others without losing your mind?
